title: Crew Show! (back from Europe)
description: Just back from Europe (Zack quite literally) we discuss the announcement of /Drive's move to NBC Sports and the resulting stories while filming alongside our good friend Jeff Glucker.  While in Europe Matt and Zack spent some quality time with the Mercedes SLS Black, McLaren 650s and Ferrari F12 Berlinetta on their way to Monaco.  Beyond the European excursion we touch upon listener questions and meander through various bits of news.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
